findings.message: Variable 'total' initialized to None instead of 0. This will cause TypeError when trying to add numbers.
Division by zero error. The divide function is called with b=0 which will raise ZeroDivisionError.
findings.suggestion: Add validation: if b == 0: raise ValueError('Cannot divide by zero')

findings.message: Potential TypeError if 'total' is None. Consider using sum() built-in function instead.
